channel.title: Murder Mystery on Kevin Li
channel.description: Recent content in Murder Mystery on Kevin Li

item.title: Murder Mystery
item.description: Like my ancestors used to say, “with Adam Sandler, you can’t expect a good movie, but you can expect a good time”. Ok, they didn’t say that exactly, but it perfectly describes “Murder Mystery”, a film that could maybe make your otherwise uneventful Tuesday night somewhat entertaining.
